item.title: 1 killed after private bus collides with container truck in Karnataka
item.description:
<![CDATA[One person was killed and at least 12 others were injured after a private bus of Sugama Travels on the Mysuruâ€“Raichur route met with an accident on the Agalagurki flyover on the Chikkaballapur bypass on January 19.
According to the police, the accident occurred when the bus, which was carrying 28 passengers, collided with a container truck while the driver was attempting to overtake another vehicle.
The impact resulted in injuries to 12 bus passengers, three of whom sustained serious injuries ...]]>
